display_long_description:
Experience the magic of the Catalan Christmas tradition with Caga Tió, an interactive game that brings joy and culture to your home! Learn about the beloved Tió de Nadal, a smiling log adorned with a Catalan hat, fed and cared for by families leading up to Christmas Eve. The magic happens when you sing traditional songs and use a stick to tap the Tió, which “poops” out gifts in a festive surprise!

This unique experience combines fun, tradition, and education, making it ideal for anyone curious about Catalan culture. Don’t miss the chance to explore this heartwarming holiday custom in a delightful new way. Play now and let the Tió bring smiles and presents to your Christmas!

Copyright Notice:

Illustration of the Caga Tió by Lia Aramburu, available on Vecteezy.
The Tió song and all related rights belong to CCMA, SA.
Caga Tió · Cor de l'Escola de Sant Gregori de Barcelona · SX3 · Josep Mas Kitflus · I. Miralbell · a. Maria Ribas.
The main menu song was downloaded from Pixabay.
